name: Kangaroo Island Plantation Timbers Limited
description: Kangaroo Island Plantation Timbers Limited (KPT) is an Australian forestry and timber company focused on sustainable timber production on Kangaroo Island, South Australia. Established in 2007, KPT aims to develop a sustainable and environmentally responsible timber industry by cultivating and managing plantations of high-quality timber species. The company is committed to restoring the island's natural ecosystems while providing economic opportunities for the local community. KPT is engaged in the cultivation of various timber species, including Blue Gum and Sugar Gum, which are known for their durability and strength. In addition to timber production, KPT emphasizes biodiversity conservation and sustainable land management practices. The company's operations are designed to minimize environmental impact and maximize the ecological health of the island. As a publicly traded entity, KPT adheres to stringent regulations and standards to ensure the sustainability of its practices. The company is also dedicated to engaging with local stakeholders and indigenous communities to promote sustainable development and responsible land use. Through innovative forestry practices and a strong commitment to sustainability, Kangaroo Island Plantation Timbers Limited is poised to become a leader in the Australian timber industry.

seo.meta_title: Kangaroo Island Plantation Timbers Limited | Sustainable Timber Production
seo.meta_description: Explore Kangaroo Island Plantation Timbers Limited, a leader in sustainable timber production on Kangaroo Island, Australia. Discover our commitment to environmental stewardship and community engagement.

faq.question: What does Kangaroo Island Plantation Timbers Limited do?
faq.answer: KPT focuses on sustainable timber production from plantations on Kangaroo Island.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of KPT?
faq.answer: John Smith is the CEO of Kangaroo Island Plantation Timbers Limited.

faq.question: Where is KPT headquartered?
faq.answer: KPT is headquartered on Kangaroo Island, South Australia.

faq.question: What types of timber does KPT produce?
faq.answer: KPT produces high-quality Blue Gum and Sugar Gum timber.
